about_the_game:
A story about scary pictures.

This is a short horror novel game without the element of surprise, which can make you feel still and unpleasant.

This title progresses only by clicking. No difficult operations are required.

Scary pictures, unusual pictures, and happy pictures will meet you.

What emotions will you feel when you see ......?

This title contains descriptions that may provoke feelings of fear, anxiety, and disgust. It includes descriptions that remind you of suicide, grotesque descriptions, and collective fear.

It is published as a free game.

Picture Series

『恐絵 -kyoukai-』

『異絵 -ikai-』

『幸絵 -koukai-』

『生帰-syouki-』

The above four works are combined into one work.
Translation into English, Chinese and Korean will be available.
Two additional stories, "Yuukai" and "Kaiwa," will be added and updated during the summer of 2022.

Differences between the free and paid versions
The paid version prioritizes typographical errors and minor corrections.
The paid version will be updated to allow users to choose the language of translation, but the free version will not be released in a translated version.
Only the paid version will be updated with an additional short story called "Kaiwa". (Both the paid and free version will be updated with an additional short story called "yuukai")

Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)

content_descriptors.notes:
Illustrations with realistic grotesque expressions using collage appear frequently in this game.
There are expressions such as multiple human body parts attached to the skin, multiple empty holes in the human body (aggregates), out-of-this-world objects gushing from the human body, and suicide-like expressions.
